评论详情: I love these for working out and spending time in the heat. They are well made and have very pretty colors that don't run in the wash or shrink. I did find that they run a bit large. I ordered the purple and magenta type color.  I like my shirts a bit long and these are that, and they are flowy. They are not too flowy for me, but just a little roomier than I expected. I think I could have gone a size down, but I always like the option of wearing another cute close fitting tank underneath, so I didn't try a smaller size. The shoulder area fits as expected and these are comfy tanks.

I love this item, bought the grey and want to purchase more! I've got a bit of leftover momma fluff around the belly- this tank has just right amount of looseness and length to be comfortable but not look sloppy. If you're like me it's hard to find tanks that fit good around the armpit area, this one's made perfectly- low enough for comfort but doesn't show your bra line. The fabric is lightweight, soft, easy to machine wash/dry. Received quickly and neatly packaged. Looks good with shorts, jeans and capris. Really can't say enough good things about it 🙂 Buy it, you'll be happy you did! Update - bought another one during sale ( green) it's almost a deep heather green. Love these tops! Get one or two or more!
True to size, very cute, soft.  Good for every day or working out.

This is a really cute tank that fits and is made well. Great for the gym or just wearing out.  I am 5’6” and weigh 116. I bought the small. I washed and dried it without any shrinkage.  Shipping was quick too.
Love this top, it’s nice and loose and very comfy. Doesn’t shrink or fade in the wash. I’d recommend this.

I bought this in a size small, I wear a 34 DD bra. This top is not a bra top so you have to wear a bra with it if you’re big chested. I don’t like my bra straps to show and unfortunately with the spaghetti straps they do so I do not wear this top out of the house as my day wear, But it is a great cover-up for a bathing suit! The color is beautiful and the fabric is really nice and soft. It has a great length if you’re trying to cover up stuff like me. Bottom line is it’s a good quality and the price is very fair. Comes out of the washing machine looking as new as the day I bought it.

Just a pretty top for walking out in the heat. Fits perfect, soft lightweight material that is perfect for a hot afternoon walk. Covers the backside & mommy pooch perfectly well. Good purchase for the price!
I loved the colors and the style.  The top fit great and it's so comfy.  I may buy another.

I intend to use this as a layering shirt.  I live in East Texas.  There is air conditioning the Spring/Summer time and cool to cold weather in the late Fall and Winter.  So I thought it would be a good look under a jacket or sweater.It is very thin which would be great if you work out and get sweaty.  As a layering top has yet to de determined.

评论概述: Shirt fit is good but color is way off
评论详情: Shirt is comfortable and cute fit, but the color is completely wrong. It’s not ‘Sea Blue’ at all, but more denim blue. I bought it specifically because of the color, so I’ll probably send it back.
I like the fit
These are SO comfy and cute! I’ve used them for lounging tops or housework wear for years. You will love them and want them in multiple colors!

These tanks are the perfect weight for working out in the hot summer months in Florida. They did run a little large, I ended up sending them back and getting a smaller size, but I now have them in about 7 different colors. Keep making more colors, I'll keep buying them.
Loose fitting, which I prefer. I did think they had built-in bras, which they do not, but that was my fault.
True to size I would buy again great material
Great fit. I’m 5’2” and 165 and it gives good belly and booty coverage. It is a little low cut for me though and I wear it with another tank/higher top to feel covered
True to size, comfy and flattering.
The fit is just what I wanted.  I ordered XL and it fits great.  I usually wear large but I did not want it too tight.
I walked every day and like yoga tanks. This one is wonderful and fits perfect-true to size. If the price comes down, I will order one in every color. Would definitely recommend.
The black really isn't black it's speckled charcoal color, if it matters to you.
Top is good quality. It’s the second I ordered from this brand. Beautiful watermelon color.

I was on the fence about this top but when it arrived I was really surprised at how comfortable, well made and cool this top was. I love it so much now that I am going to order it in a,different color.
I think I have this tank in every color possible runs true to size absolutely love them and was very surprised by the quality
THese are great tops but this looks tourquois in the picture.  Is actually a pale blue
Love everything about it!
Bit oversized in style,  feels very comfy.  Good value for the money

I have several of these in diff colors. Love as loose top over tight top. The "black" is medium gray, the navy I barely can tell diff from med gray. But the purple (all are heathered colors) is brighter, really purple! Still 🤞for black or deep charcoal!

评论概述: The softness of the material.  The fit!
评论详情: The softness of the material.  The fit!
Love the top perfect fit, I'm 165 lbs at 5'7" so ordered a large. Loose fit just a bit heavy for the Caribbean.
Comfortable and great color.
I love the way the shirt fits at the bust, waist, hips. I am 5'2" , 143 lbs. and it hits just long enough to cover my front, but not long enough to cover all my bottom. It is flattering on.
Love these tank tops. Fabric is soft and light but not see through. Think I could've went down one size, but I will probably buy more colors!
Comfortable and roomy! I erred on the side of slightly bigger.

I usually buy basic solid colored exercise clothes, so this is a nice change. I was kind of borderline on size and went up. It’s a bit loose, but not excessively so.  Bought a couple of other colors, and this one was backordered. The others looked and felt nice after washing, so I think I’ll be pleased with this one, too. I find rough fabrics to be uncomfortable, but like the feeling of the fabric. It’s not too heavy but also not thin and flimsy.  I’m pleased with this tank and will probably buy more to replace others I have or so I can avoid doing laundry as often.
This tank is cute and the pattern is exactly as pictured. The weight of the tank is heavier than what I would have thought. It seems well made and of god quality.

I love that this tank is more of a tshirt material and not so thin that it shows bra lines. The double strap is super cute and it is the perfect length, so you can still see most of your shorts. I like that it is a loose fit, which is more comfortable for me. It also is very flattering in the chest area.  I am a 34-36B and I usually order smalls or mediums in tops. I ordered a medium and it fits perfect. A small would have been too tight in the chest. It didn't really shrink wash either.
It’s soft and true to size.
Liked that the color was what I expected. Looking for the right grape purple. Comfortable straps and fit.
I am going to purchase more of these! I normally wear a large I ordered xl just in case. They run a little on the smaller side so order up one size
Love this tank top to workout in

评论概述: It is ok but not the best quality
评论详情: The size was ok. I usually buy M and sometimes S. I bought a M size and it fitted. I am not sure if I would say it is a dryfit. But it did looked ok after my 30 min running. The sewing is not the greatest I must say.
I love the fit. I will definitely buy again in different colors. It's nice to find a shirt that fits well.
Fits very feel and is very flattering.
I've bought this style before and liked it.  This time the color was not what was described. It was supposed to be grey and white, it was more like brown and white
Liked the fit not too bulky. The fabric is nice and love the color.

评论概述: Product Size Chart is WAY OFF
评论详情: I followed the suggestions of other reviewers with fairly large busts as well so I purchased a large, as depending on style or designer (unless I am ordering in Asian sizing) I waffle between a Medium and Large in tops right now, being on the cusp of a 10/12.  Currently at 5'3" and 145lbs my measurements are about 34DD bra/38.5" bust - 30.5" waist - 39" hips.  I tried on this tank and it was so huge on me at a size large that it cut halfway across my bra so the lowest part hit the skin underneath the part where the cups connect.  The armholes weren't low in a cute way, like to show off a cool sports bra or lacy bralette if I ever happen to find one made with any actual support built-in.  They hit at my wait, and there was so much excess fabric on my body that they formed points from the folds while they were in the packaging still - it reminded me of looking like a flying squirrel.  I didn't mind the length from the waist down, as I had been hoping to wear this tank with legging and covering my butt was a bonus.  The width though wasn't an A-Line shape like the sizing suggests; rather the bottom width they list as the hip measurement, on the size Large tank in the shade of Grey I received was the same width for the entire tank top.  While I didn't take measurements before packaging up for return I know based on my experience with garment measurements and fitting that the bust measurement on mine was at least 10" larger than my underbust, as a trust bust measurement would have been impossible to get with the straps being so long.  Other people my height or shorter have ordered this without issue so maybe mine just happened to sneak through QC without a proper inspection?  Whatever the reason, it is going back, unfortunately.

评论概述: Rethink buying top if you are large-chested
评论详情: I bought several of these and returned those that I hadn't washed yet. The rest I'm giving to Goodwill. I'm a large on top but wear a 38D bra. This top made my chest and shoulders look HUGE, and not in a good way; I looked like a competitive swimmer who had let herself go to seed. I had hoped that the straps and shape of the back of the top near the shoulders would be flattering- they weren't. In fact, it went in the opposite direction and just made me look very big. There are other tops somewhat similar to this on Amazon that were a real winner. This one wasn't.  side note: If you are small chested with small shoulders, I'd imagine this will look really good on you. Top runs large so don't oversize your purchase. Fabric is very soft. Colors were quite lovely.
Fits amazing true to size

Love this workout top and I would love to buy more in other colors, but you need to offer an XS. Your small shows to be a size 8 on the size guide which is a Med, not Small. So, beware and check the size guide - they run big. When might you offer an XS?

I generally like the fit of this top. The length is perfect and the loose fit hides my belly, but the chest is too loose. I ordered a medium like I do with all my tops, but I think I should have gotten the next size down. It seems this top runs large.

Fits as expected. Nice material. Was hoping to upgrade some gym shirts and not only will this shirt fit the bill, it's cute enough that I could wear outside the gym as well. Only gave 4 stars as I have not laundered yet. Will likely purchase additional colors.

I was not expecting much, or to love this tank, but it's fabulous. I'm pretty particular with my workout tanks. I like looser around the mid section and not long, while still being higher at the neckline and comfortable overall. I know, not looking for much! These hit all the buttons. Definitely recommend and plan on getting more, and even some as just every day tanks that are not for working out.

These tanks are exactly what I was looking for. They fit up top without the arm holes being too large and the body is relaxed and not fitted over my larger than it should be belly. I also have the purple which I had ordered first and loved it so much I then ordered this one. They are very soft and comfortable although nowhere does it actually state what the fabric content is. It feels cottony but also dries quickly. It is lightweight but not in any way see through. One note is that although this says Watermelon Red, it is definitely more of a heathered bright pink color which is fine because that is what I wanted. They are maybe a bit pricey but since they are so perfect, I'm not complaining.
The material is a good quality.  I like the looser fit. I dont like when my clothes cling to me so this is exactly what I was looking for.
Order a size down. Unless your wanting it really long and loose.

To the Manufacturer:  These are the most comfortable tops ever.  I love, love, love them.  However, it would  really be a big plus if you would not have the manufacturer's name tacked into the back of the top.  I am allergic to the nylon thread you are using to do that and it breaks me out on my back horribly.  If you could just have the manufacturer's name imprinted on the inside, that would be awesome.  I have to cut the labels out and pick out the thread, which takes quite a bit of time so as not to accidentally cause any damage to the top itself.  I still give these tops 5 stars, even with the comment about the thread.
Light weight and soft
The white tank is so so pretty but material is incredibly thin and see through. I'm as white as they come and you can see my skin through it.
I have this in red and gray, the red fit beautifully, the gray for a little different and was shorter but still nice.

Really happy with this. I ordered more. They are cute and I can wear to work under a sweater or outside casually in summer.... works for me, wears and washes well. I love the variety of colors it comes in, has not faded

Love this shirt. It’s soft and comfortable. It’s a little big, so I think I would get a medium Next time. Overall a great shirt though.  Update: I got two shirts in medium since I liked the shirt itself, but the mediums fit weirdly. The gathered part in the front doesn’t sit nicely, and the parts under my armpits creep up constantly and I have to pull the sides down a lot. It might very well just be my build, because the size was right for the torso, but not sure I would wear the mediums at all. The sizing difference between the medium and large was significant.

This top is perfect dual purpose workout and loungeware when wanted.  The fabric and print is comfortable and funThe fit runs on the larger side so if you are more petite in the bust [I am on the larger side of breast section] I would recommend going down a size.  I purchased a medium and if not for my bosom the top would be a low rider.
Love it

评论概述: If you like loose fit, size up.
评论详情: I am 5’5”, 150 lbs. with some muffin top. I do not like tight fitting workout clothes and I like some length just to cover my crotch. I regularly wear a medium, so that’s what I ordered. It’s not flowy but not skin tight. It’s tighter than I would like. The length is just about my hip, not my crotch. I wish I had ordered a large. I think that would have been a better fit for me. The material is lightweight and the dark gray color is true to the picture.

I bought this on the off chance it would match my boho pants. Not only did it match perfectly (color was true to photos) it was soft, comfortable, and roomy. I loved it so much that I bought 4 more colors to match the rest of my pants. I'm 5'7" 221lbs and kind of a pear shape. Thus shirt hid my mommy belly perfectly. So happy.
The only reason I gave 4 stars is because it would be awesome if it had a built in bralette since the material is kind of thin. Otherwise it’s perfect!

Great shirt! I ordered the bright blue simply because it was the cheapest and immediately ordered two more. I am 5’5 and 150 lbs, got the medium. I generally go between a medium and large these days, the medium was perfect, so you probably want to go with the smaller size. Hides the post-baby pooch very nicely. My only complaint is the color. I ordered the “white,” which in the picture looks very much like a very light heather gray but it’s completely white. I don’t think I want to work out in a white shirt any time soon, but I have no doubt I’ll still find ways to wear it.
Wish it were slightly longer

评论概述: Great fit, color of Orange Red is off...
评论详情: Super soft and good fit! The Dark Green pic was accurate. However the Orange Red pic looks different from what I received. The color sent to me is bright, blaze orange and not marled (variagated) like the photo. Not much red in it and given the pictures I expected something a bit darker. Bummed a bit by the color, but it's too much hassle to return it. Would have given 5 stars if the color was right because fit and style are awesome! Definitely worth buying, just know the colors and fabric might be a bit off.

(If you're ordering this as a workout tank top, it is made of t-shirt type material not moisture wicking just as an FYI.)  Very cute and comfortable as a tank top and generously cut across the chest. but it hit the widest part of my hip. Would be nice to either be a little shorter in the front and longer in the back or longer all the way around. Shrunk a ton in the wash the first time... beware

Very flattering little shirt.  I bought what I thought was going to be a burnt orange (looked that way in the pictures) but it is a true orange.  Still really cute, flattering around the chest/bustline.  I will buy other colors.  I haven't worked out in it yet so not sure how it does with wicking, staying dry, etc...but some other reviews may talk about that.  For ~$20, it's a steal!

Really like the way this top fits and flows for casual wear. Fair warning though – it runs really large. Amazon was recommending a size large to me, but I had to go down one and could’ve gone down 2. Not sure if I would recommend for working out – the fabric has more of a jersey feel so I don’t think it would be as comfortable there.

I love this tank! Having kids I wanted a tank that was flattering, yet cover my mommy tummy. The top portion covers and shapes the chest perfectly and the bottom is loose enough to cover a little weight in the middle without looking sloppy. The shirt is a good length with shorts, long enough that you you can lift your arms without showing skin but short enough that you still see you are wearing shorts. I ordered a small and I am 133-135lbs, 5’ 2”, 36C, and wearing a size 5/6 jeans with a mommy belly.

评论概述: 2 sizes bigger than expected - runs very large
评论详情: I’m usually between a small / medium in tops (5’5” 140lbs 36B) I ordered a small in this hoping it wouldn’t be loose. It’s so big - if you wear UA or Nike tank tops / athletic shirts this small is the equivalent of a large or xl in those brands. The small was way too big for me.
Love the color but the fabric seems a bit heavy

评论概述: Cute top, but on the small side, not especially well made.
评论详情: For the price, I expected an average top with average sizing and pretty close to the color. I got a cheaply made top from a decent fabric that was lighter than in photos (navy heather = medium blue heather), loose threads, would have turned into a belly top soon as I washed it, and drape got stuck above the hips. (Beware curvy grrls: I have narrow boyish hips: hem should have fallen to my hip socket. it didn't go past my upper waist without stretching it down.) Returned immediately. Moving on.
Absolutely love this tank! I wear them with Nike shorts I took it on every camping trip. It was perfect for our summer temperatures. Thinking I'll order other colors next year.
I love this tank! Soft material, flattering pleats and I love the straps! And it fits nicely over my hips.

评论概述: Most definitely worth the buy and true to size
评论详情: Love these tank tops! So much so that I just ordered 2 more in different colors! I don't work out (though I should) so I didn't buy it for that. Though it would be comfy to workout in. I'm usually a size large to XL so I bought the white one in large and the blue one in XL. As you can see in the pictures the white one (large) fits great and looks great. The blue one (XL) fits great too with a little extra room. Also the white one is a little see-through as you can see my bra a bit, but it's not a deal breaker.

Absolutely love this top! I was half expecting another top that way unflattering and made me look pregnant but this was a pleasant surprise!! It is super cute and the neckline adds all the accent you need to not make it too plain. The length makes is so nice to wear with leggings or jeans. I ordered more in other colors because I really like it that much. I’ve had mixed experiences with clothing shopping online but this purchase was a hit!! It also doesn’t show my belly and rolls lol ladies you know what I mean!! It’s the perfect mix of fitted and flattering. I HIGHLY recommend.

I am SO glad I found these tops.  The fit is so comfortable, true to size..  Also ladies, if you aren't a size 6 anymore, you'll be happy to know they give you room at the hips and waist and don't show off every single unflattering point on your bod..  They are so cute with leggings or jean shorts, very versatile.  I have purchased 5 at this point.  The colors are also true to the description.  If you want a comfy shirt that is flattering and something you can wear to the gym  or out shopping, buy this shirt..

I bought 3 of these shirts I loved the fit so much. I am 5'9" and bought medium. They are loose and flowy enough to be comfortable and not cling to your mid section and the neckline is just low enough to make the girls look good while still being modest but there was one thing I didnt like about them. Sizing remained consistent however all 3 were different kinds of material. The grayish black one was heavy thick fabric that I would have never thought of as a work out shirt. The bright blue one was very stretchy and somewhat stiff. And the dark blue was just a regular light weight soft fabric. Definitely read the materials under each colors description as they vary. Wish I had paid closer attention to that.
Workout in this top but also use it for casual wear. Washes up beautifully. Susan

评论概述: This is by far my favorite work out top. I want one in every color!
评论详情: This is my absolute favorite work out tank! The cut and design of it is very flattering. I like that it is a longer top, so there's no chance of it riding up when you're doing anything. I wear it to my yoga classes all the time, and it stays in place through all my downward dogs - no showing the class my stomach with this top!  I also LOVE that it is a looser fit through the midsection. I cannot stand tops that cling to you when working out. With it being looser in the midsection (flowey is a good description) I don't have to worry that any pudge is going to show when I wear this. I can't stress how flattering the fit is. I will be buying more in different colors. Love Love Love!

i think i wouldve liked it. they sent an extra large shirt with an 'M' tag in it. didnt have time to drive a half hour from my house to mail it back to get 1 that fits, so i cant say if i like it or if itd fit:( all i know is i dont ever buy much for myself, i spend what little i have on my kids, so im pretty much 100% pissed that this isnt going to fit and ive now wasted my money. very very weird sizing, could fit like 3 of me in there, and im just the u.s. average jane. 5'3½", 108 pounds. get at least 1 size down

I love this shirt.  So glad I bought it.  I hesitated, looked at it, looked at it again, put it in my cart, then saved it for later and then bought it.  I am SOOOOOOOO glad I did.  Fits very well, true to size, so soft against my skin.  I wouldn't wear it for a work out, but that is because it is so soft.  There is no built in bra so a sports bra will be necessary, if you want to wear it for a work out.
I love wearing this tank top, it is absolutely flattering and easy to wear, doesn’t wrinkle or shrink. It is beautiful and the fabric is soft within being too thin.
Super cute and comfortable. It is a little longer than I thought. I ordered a Medium, but probably could have sized down. I still love it.  5’3 - 135 lbs
I love this top! is is not tight in the mid section. not supper low in the chest area. 220lb, 42F, got the XXL top

评论概述: Love this tank but white color is see through
评论详情: I have this tank in blue and wear it all the time.  I'm a 32 DDD and a small size fits well without being too tight, this tank minimizes my large chest somehow.  The material is thicker than most tanks so I ordered it in white with the hope that it wouldn't be see through - wrong.  It was see through so it went back.

I do like this shirt - it is comfortable and fits fine except for maybe the tag is a little itchy. I only gave it four stars because I ordered red and I received a color that looks more like coral.  So if you are buying it for the color being red then this is not the shirt for you.
Comfy but color is lighter than image shown. I expected a more rich teal but it was a softer demin blue.

评论概述: Great quality, true to size and very comfortable
评论详情: Perfect fit! I’m 5’9”, about 180 lbs and have DD’s so I ordered a XL and they fit perfect. They fit my large chest and cover any side boob and flow over my belly to hide it, but without looking like a circus tent, and a little longer length so great for tall women. The fabric is good quality and definitely not see through, also does not wrinkle easily. No static whatsoever. I will be ordering more for sure!

I’m 5’10, 177 lbs. Top fits fine at shoulders and neck, and length is at my crotch.  The finish is good, with nice seams and it’s  very soft and light weight but not see through. I’m 43 inches at my widest point just below my belly button and it’s a little too tight. It looks and feels like it might shrink.  If I loose a couple inches it will be perfect.

Love love these tops. I probably have 8 or more. Very comfortable ! The issue I have is twice I received the wrong color. Today I got a dark blue one and I should have been the sea blue. Completely different then what I ordered. Not happy.
I love the material, feels soft, the color is great. I am ordering another one in different color. This is perfect to wear this warm summer!
I have several of these in different colors and love the fit and comfort. The fabric and color holds up after many washings.

评论概述: Comfy work out top; not clingy
评论详情: I purchased this large and it gave me room. That was my preference. I love the color & feel. Nice top can be worn with a skirt or shorts if you wanted. Overall pleased with this style, size, color, & comfortable material

The problem with ordering any type of shirt for me is that I have a short torso and a huge chest, so trying to find something that actually fits how I want it to fit is a NIGHTMARE! BUT this tanktop came just down to my upper thigh, it wasn't too loose but also not really tight - fitted but not to the body; it wasn't stuck to me like glue (a good thing). HIGHLY recommend this product!
Very lightweight so good for outdoors in FL. Runs large. Color is true and does not bleed when washed. Pre-shrunk…trust me, I tried!
